title: RH after VSG - need help
text: 8 mo post VSG and dealing w/ reactive hypo. Getting shakines, dizzyness, and sweeting about 90 min after eating. My endo prescribed acerbose but I keep forgetting to take it. Using my CGM (continous glucose monitr) and seeing drops to the 50s. Anyone else experiance this? What meds worked for u? Heard about avexitid from Amylyx but not sure if its approved yet.
